programs.title: exist Startup Grant
programs.description: Developed and launched a startup idea as part of the {{exist}} scholarship program funded by the German Federal Ministry for Economic Affairs and Climate Action (BMWK).
achievements: Winner of the TGFS Technologiegr√ºnderfonds Sachsen Award as part of the {{hhl}} Digitale Space Program 2025.

awards.title: DataFest 24h Hackathon
awards.description: Developed a collision detection algorithm and visualization for data from a season of women's rugby.
achievements: Won 3rd place out of 19 teams for both best data insight and best data visualization.

Freelance & Pro Bono.title: Pro Bono Tutoring
Freelance & Pro Bono.description: Helping fellow students and peers with mathematics and statistics, or study design and analytics.

Freelance & Pro Bono.title: Author-Index-Matching
Freelance & Pro Bono.description: Built a author-index-matching to prevent manually checking ~60,000 literature index entries.
